column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Through my profession , I have come to appreciate that how things are communicated is just as important as what is being communicated .
#Text=Sometimes the words we choose or the method we select to share an idea gets in the way of people appreciating it and embracing it .
#Text=Why is this important ?
#Text=Because a President who is attentive to not only what he is saying , but how he is saying it , is apt to be more effective at rallying people to a common cause .
#Text=My work in advertising , for which I have won many awards , has demanded that I generate creative solutions , and help inspire them in others , virtually every single day .
#Text=I know how to " think outside the box . " Why is this important ?
#Text=We all know that our country and world face major challenges , to put it mildly .
#Text=Our only hope in overcoming these challenges is our ability to generate innovative solutions .
#Text=Identify the three most important issues , what would they be ?
#Text=How will you address these issues ?
#Text=Global warming .

#Text=I endorse tax incentives and government grant programs to support and reward those private-sector initiatives aimed at developing renewable energy sources , or improving the efficiency of traditional , carbon-based energy sources .
#Text=In addition , I have proposed that NASA be “ repurposed ” for two to three decades to help fight global warming .
#Text=What I envision is asking the very bright scientists and engineers at NASA to direct their gaze down at Earth rather than up in the stars .
#Text=This way , we can tap into their collective brainpower to help develop new technologies to improve energy efficiency and to slow global warming .
#Text=I have long been a fan of NASA and space travel , and I understand and appreciate the many benefits of space exploration .
#Text=But the need is so great to slow , and eventually halt , global warming , that drastic measures are required .
#Text=National Security .

#Text=As President , I would keep a healthy military and intelligence budget , all along making sure that we are training and caring for our soldiers as they prepare and wait for duty , as they are assigned and as they return and adjust to civilian life .
#Text=Our record on this has n’t been pretty of late .
#Text=I would also raise the pay of all military personnel .
#Text=Finally , I would make sure that we have the best-equipped fighting force in the world .

#Text=I would work quickly to secure our borders by putting additional measures in place : monitored fencing ; more border crossing guards ; small , mobile groups of elite soldiers to “ spot check ” our borders ; more resources for the Coast Guard to protect our shores ; and more human and technical resources to monitor those who come to play or work in our country .
#Text=We need to talk more with other nations , especially those we consider enemies or those that are particularly influential in world affairs .
#Text=As such , I will invest in a more robust diplomatic core , particularly with China and the Middle East .
